name: Word Mania - Free Word Search Puzzle Game For Kids
name_original: Word Mania - Free Word Search Puzzle Game For Kids
description:
Word Mania is an original highscores word search game with a new and refreshed gameplay, 3 game modes, over 170K words to be found and possibility to submit your score! Can you make it into TOP20?

Challenge people all around the world in this addicting puzzle game!

Play Challenge mode and try to create as many words as you can from the provided letters - use all the letters on the board to progress to the next level and watch out for the time limit!

In the Time Attack and Fast Game you have exactly 120 seconds to create as many words as you can, in Time Attack perform combos to get extra seconds! Go for highscores!

Features
* 3 game modes - Challenge, Time Attack and Fast Game
* Over 170K English words included
* Global leaderboards included - submit and review points of other people
* Addicting and original word game suitable for all ages
* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases
